name: Two Level Truchet Pattern Pen Plot #293792
description:
This is an application of the principle of Multi-Scale Truchet Patterns (Carlson, 2018), which generates multiscale patterns and yields a large variety of forms. This design is based on a noise grid with two levels.

This is made with Nodebox, a node-based visual language for generative art. All artworks are unique because they are based on a random seed value. This is #293792.

This is a ‘plottable artwork’. Which means it can be drawn by a machine: a pen plotter. This design is plotted with a Posca PC-1MR Paint Marker 0.7 Metallic Blue on ClaireFontaine Trophée Black 210 grams A4 paper. Color shown here is for illustration purposes.  

I am happy to deliver a physical drawing after purchase (international shipping included). Feel free to DM me via twitter.com/floris_de_jonge or instagram.com/dejongefloris/. Pictures of plotted designs can be found there as well.
